text: 4:6 Onger Akaba 91:11-12; Jon 7:3-4Egha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ oragh, Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘A nɨ bagh uan enselba akar gavgavim me mɨkɨmtɨma me deraghvɨra nɨn ganam. Egh me uan dafaribar nɨ fueghtɨ, nɨ uan dagarim dagɨatamɨn aneseghan kogham!’ Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ guizbangɨra Godɨn Otarim, nɨ kagh ikɨ uabɨ ekunigh.”
